channel.title: Cannot teleport above 20 wild

item.title: Cannot teleport above 20 wild
item.dc:creator: @powerknite7 powerknite7
item.description:
@powerknite7 wrote:

well , i dont know how to do that
but i shoud make normal teleport commands
here is 'n exemple

[code]}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“varrock”) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) {
toX = 3214;
toY = 3424;
sM(“welcome to varrock.”);
}else{
sM(“You can’t use this in the wild.”);

}[/code]
yust change the coords and stuff , wel if u want an portal to do the same use this

 && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) {

goodluck.

item.title: Cannot teleport above 20 wild
item.dc:creator: @_ExiledScape `ExiledScape
item.description:
@_ExiledScape wrote:

Hm, My method doesn’t work.

I want to make it so you can’t teleport above 20 wild with this:

if (item_id == 7811) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - teleDelay < 1500) return; deleteItem(7811, getItemSlot(7811), 1); setAnimation(1906); toX = 3222; toY = 3220; teleDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); heightLevel = 0; sM("You teleport to home."); }

My version was fail…

if (item_id == 7811) { if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){ sM("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!"); } } if (item_id == 7811) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - teleDelay < 1500) return; deleteItem(7811, getItemSlot(7811), 1); setAnimation(1906); toX = 3222; toY = 3220; teleDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); heightLevel = 0; sM("You teleport to home."); }

Read full topic
